snippet: The family of Chen Guangcheng, the blind Chinese dissident whose daring escape from house arrest embarrassed China, says his nephew  is not getting treatment for appendicitis.
abstract: Human rights advocates accuse Chinese authorities of denying urgent medical care to Chen Kegui, jailed nephew of blind dissident Chen Guangcheng; say move is aimed at punishing Chen for his continued antigovernment activism abroad.
lead_paragraph: The family of Chen Guangcheng, the blind Chinese dissident whose daring escape from house arrest embarrassed China, says his nephew  is not getting treatment for appendicitis.

headline.seo: China Accused of Denying Care to Chen Guangcheng’s Nephew
headline.main: China Accused of Denying Care to Dissident’s Imprisoned Nephew
headline.print_headline: China: Dissident’s Nephew Is Said To Be Denied Prison Medical Care

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
